mapper.select: select c.cart_no, pb.product_no, pb.product_name, pb.product_category, pb.product_price, pb.brand_name, pb.product_skintype, c.cart_count, c.cart_regDate from cart c join (select p.*, b.* from product_table P join brand B on p.product_brand = b.brand_num) pb on c.product_no = pb.product_no where c.user_num = #{user_num}
